segments.description: 1. When you select a selection and tap the selection, a touch tool strip will pop up.
2. You can use the built-in tool strip items: Paste, Cut, Copy, and AutoFill.
3. You can also customize a touch tool strip item and add it to the touch tool strip.

segments.description: You can use the text method to get and set the text of the item, use the font method to get and set the font of the item text, and use the foreColor method to get and set the color of the item text.
4. After you add the touch tool strip item, you can use getItem and getItems to get the items. Also, you can remove one or clear all the items.
